text: @realDonaldTrump Fuck heritage! Stay on point!!! Our country has been dealing with civil unrest plus the out of control spread of the coronavirus. You have not addressed one you don’t seem to take the other seriously. Show some Civil concern & tell us to wear a mask 😷, act like you care.
